product.name: Metal Vacuum Stand Compatible for Dyson V15/V12/V11/V10/V8/V7/V6-6.6lbs Heavy Base Metal Storage Bracket Holder, Ultra Stable Floor Stand for Cordless Vacuum Cleaners & Accessories
product.description:
Beautiful solid electric broom stand perfectly compatible with a variety of Dyson models
Assembles in moments and is immediately efficient
I preface that brooms have their own support to be hung on the wall which I had not used as I had no intention of turning the wall with the drill
With this stand the one that came with the electric broom simply screws on, making it ideal precisely for not drilling holes in the walls
What's more, it also comes with a stand for all possible and imaginable accessories so on a vertical goose you have everything at your fingertips!!!
Excellent really the quality of the whole compared to the of sale
It's really worth it!Definitely recommended for those like me who don't want to drill holes in the wall to place the charging vacuum cleaner and have all the accessories in order and within reach!Absolutely in line with the quality provided，I highly recommend it!！！！
product.bullet_points:
• 【Premium Dysn Stand】European-Designed Organizer for Dyson Gen5/V15/V12/V11/V10/V8/V7/V6 – 6.6 lb Heavy Base, No Drill,【Note】: It is compatible with Gen5, but the Back Shadow Hidden Wire feature does not work! The docking station is not included in this product!
• ✅ 【Perfect Match for Dyson】 Designed in Europe to perfectly complement Dysn’s premium aesthetics, featuring a sleek color-matched finish that blends seamlessly with your vacuum. No more clunky plastic holders—elevate your space with designer storage.
• ✅ 【Ultra-Stable 6.6 lb Base】 The heaviest base on the market (20% weightier than standard stands) ensures rock-solid stability, even for bulky models like the Gen5 Outsize. Non-slip silicone pads prevent scratches and keep it firmly in place.
• ✅ 【No Drill, Easy Assembly】 Freestanding design means no wall damage—just unpack, assemble in minutes (tools included), and enjoy hassle-free organization. High-strength stainless steel frame won’t rust or wobble.
• ✅ 【Smart Storage w/ 3 Hooks】 Store all Dysn attachments & charger with 6 adjustable hooks—position them anywhere for customized organization. Hidden cable management keeps cords tidy and out of sight.
• ✅ 【Luxury Gift-Ready】 Packaged in elegant, gift-ready box—perfect for housewarming, birthdays, or holidays. A must-have for Dysn owners who appreciate premium design & functionality.
